org.scribe.builder

Class ServiceBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.scribe.builder.ServiceBuilder

  • public class ServiceBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of the Builder pattern, with a fluent interface that creates a OAuthService
    Author:
    Pablo Fernandez
